improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero.  The variable 'y' could become 0 in the loop (line 6-8) depending on x. Add a check before line 9 to handle this case. For example: if (y == 0) { print("Error: Division by zero"); } else { z = x / y; }
The loop iterates 49 times. If the value of x becomes very small or large the result of x/y could cause unexpected issues or overflow.
